theSenseless:CardStupor.NAME: Stupor
theSenseless:CardStupor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy. Gain !M! thesenseless:Drunk.

theSenseless:CardForgottenTechnique.NAME: Forgotten Technique
theSenseless:CardForgottenTechnique.DESCRIPTION: thesenseless:Wilt a card from your Discard Pile.
theSenseless:CardForgottenTechnique.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. thesenseless:Wilt a card from your Discard Pile.

theSenseless:CardDejaVu.NAME: Deja Vu
theSenseless:CardDejaVu.DESCRIPTION: thesenseless:Wilt a card from your Exhaust Pile.

theSenseless:CardSwitcheroo.NAME: Switcheroo
theSenseless:CardSwitcheroo.DESCRIPTION: Switch all cards in your Discard Pile with your Draw Pile.
theSenseless:CardSwitcheroo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Switch all cards in your Discard Pile with your Draw Pile.

theSenseless:CardEarlyBird.NAME: Early Bird
theSenseless:CardEarlyBird.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of your turn, thesenseless:Wilt a Card from your Discard Pile.

theSenseless:CardDrunkenFist.NAME: Drunken Fist
theSenseless:CardDrunkenFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you are thesenseless:Drunk, Draw a Card.

theSenseless:CardVengeance.NAME: Vengeance
theSenseless:CardVengeance.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to all the unblocked damage you've taken this turn and last turn.

theSenseless:CardWindmillKick.NAME: Windmill Kick
theSenseless:CardWindmillKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 4 times. If you are thesenseless:Drunk, deal damage to ALL enemies. Shuffle a Dazed into your Draw Pile.

theSenseless:CardBearHug.NAME: Bear Hug
theSenseless:CardBearHug.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! thesenseless:Grappled and deal !D! damage. Take !M! Damage. If the target is already thesenseless:Grappled, Deal !D! more damage.

theSenseless:CardBurial.NAME: Burial
theSenseless:CardBurial.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. thesenseless:Wilt a card from your Discard Pile.

theSenseless:CardCurtail.NAME: Curtail
theSenseless:CardCurtail.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 Card. Discard 1 Card.  thesenseless:Wilt a card from your Discard Pile.

theSenseless:CardQuickThinking.NAME: Quick Thinking
theSenseless:CardQuickThinking.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card in you hand. Gain !M! Energy.
theSenseless:CardQuickThinking.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in you hand. Gain !M! Energy.

theSenseless:CardDirectory.NAME: Directory
theSenseless:CardDirectory.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Put a card from your Discard Pile on top of your Draw Pile.

theSenseless:CardMasochist.NAME: Masochist
theSenseless:CardMasochist.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from a card, gain !M! Temporary Strength.

theSenseless:CardLastStand.NAME: Last Stand
theSenseless:CardLastStand.DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. Next hit that would have killed you will instead leave you at !M! HP.

theSenseless:CardComboStarter.NAME: Combo Starter
theSenseless:CardComboStarter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Everytime you play this card, increase the damage of all cards containing "Combo" by !M!.

theSenseless:CardOneInchPunch.NAME: One Inch Punch
theSenseless:CardOneInchPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Deal 1 Damage less for each card currently in your Deck.

theSenseless:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theSenseless:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theSenseless:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theSenseless:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theSenseless:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theSenseless:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theSenseless:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theSenseless:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theSenseless:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theSenseless:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theSenseless:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theSenseless:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theSenseless:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
